DOC.brief_summary: This exploratory study aim evaluate diagnostic , prognostic response predictive value multi biomarker strategy patient Gastroenteropancreatic Neuroendocrine Tumors ( GEP NETs ) originate midgut pancreas . Using recently develop methodology enable evaluation 92 concomitant cancer biomarkers provide interesting approach solve question ( Lundberg et al 2011 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study For Evaluating The Value Of A Multi Biomarker Approach In Metastatic GEP NETs
DOC.criteria: Provision write informed consent prior study related procedure . Suspected suffer metastatic midgut NET Pancreatic nonfunctional NET ( WHO grade 1 2 , 10 % Ki67 ) . Male female age 18 old . Previously treat NET disease pharmaceutical treatment , Peptide Receptor Radionuclide Therapy ( PRRT ) radiation therapy ( surgery primary tumour accept ) Has mental condition render subject unable understand nature , scope possible consequence study , and/or evidence uncooperative attitude .
